author: trtomei
body:
Trying again to push the Exotica Trigger Validation to CMSSW.

Compiles cleanly in CMSSW_7_1_X_2014-03-25-0200.
Runs successfully in runTheMatrix.py, as show in attached screenshot.

![screen shot 2014-03-26 at 15 24 44](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4937855/2525716/6c9ed542-b4f2-11e3-8861-3bd872588b8f.png)

Cheers,
Thiago
title: Take 2 of Exotica Trigger Validation
